parameters.name: TemplateConfig
parameters.description: The detailed configurations of the AI template. The value must be a JSON string. For more information, see [AITemplateConfig](~~89863#title-vd3-499-o36~~).

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the AI template. The name can be up to 128 bytes in length.

parameters.name: TemplateType
parameters.description:
The type of the AI template. Valid values:

*   **AIMediaAudit**: automated review
*   **AIImage**: smart thumbnail
